trans-unit.target: TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_NONOTTA_000_045<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, what excellent timing! I was handing out another pile of gifts to our helpers, and am in dire need of a tea break. Would you be so kind...?
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_SYSTEM_000_046<tab>You can now replay the gift-giving task from the quest “A Poultry Sum.”
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_Q1_000_000<tab>Begin distributing the gifts?
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_KANESENNA_000_020<tab>Greetings. We have come to report the completion of our part in the decorations.

TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_KANESENNA_000_021<tab>'Tis a joyful duty to assist with the Hatching<var 1F /var>tide adornments, knowing that every inhabitant of Gridania might enjoy the festivities. I hope you, too, will take a moment to join in this rare chance for revelry.

TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_KANESENNA_000_022<tab>...In charge of rewarding festival helpers, you say? I've not done aught so grand as to merit a reward, but in the spirit of the occasion I shall humbly accept your gift.
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_Q4_000_000<tab>Which gift set will you choose from?
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_A4_000_001<tab>The rabbit and chicken stuffed toys.
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_A4_000_002<tab>The painted eggs filled with treats.
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_A4_000_003<tab>The opulent Archon eggs.
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_KANESENNA_000_023<tab>My, what charming little toys.
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_KANESENNA_000_024<tab>If you'll take the rabbit, then I shall claim this adorable chicken.
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_BODYGUARD01623_000_025<tab>A gift from y-you...? I shall treasure it always!
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_KANESENNA_000_026<tab>My, what lovely colors... And judging by this scent, there are baked treats hiding within. A perfect accompaniment for my morning tea.
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_KANESENNA_000_027<tab>Well, isn't this exquisite... It shall grace my mantle as a memento of these happy celebrations.
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_KANESENNA_000_028<tab>Such a lovely surprise! Now, if you will pray excuse us...

TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_MIOUNNE_000_030<tab>Hah, why am I not surprised to see you here? We had a guild meeting scheduled, but you know how adventurers are─we just had to get involved in the celebrations.
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_MOMODI_000_031<tab>And seein' how the Dreamers always do such a nice job of decoratin' Ul'dah, I figured this was the perfect chance for me to return the favor.
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_BADERON_000_032<tab>Eh? Passin' out presents to us laborers, are ye? Far be it from me to refuse a gift given freely!
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_Q5_000_000<tab>Which gift set will you choose from?
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_A5_000_001<tab>The rabbit and chicken stuffed toys.
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_A5_000_002<tab>The painted eggs filled with treats.
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_A5_000_003<tab>The opulent Archon eggs.
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_MOMODI_000_033<tab>Oooh, those are just darlin', ain't they? Not exactly a match for the Quicksand's decor, though, so I might need to keep 'em in my room...
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_MIOUNNE_000_034<tab>Ah, these are the type they fill with baked delights! There's nothing better than enjoying a sweet treat after a hard day's work.

TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_BADERON_000_035<tab>Don't go 'oardin' 'em all to yerself now. I've got time for a quick bite an' a cup o' Mother Miounne's best tea afore I make the trip back to Limsa Lominsa.
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_MOMODI_000_036<tab>Sounds like a grand idea. Count me in!

TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_BADERON_000_037<tab>Now ain't that a delicate beauty! But where's a safe spot to put it? Wouldn't survive two days in the Wench, considerin' the unsteady state o' me regular clientele...
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_MIOUNNE_000_038<tab>We'd best be off and leave you to your business, then. Do come visit us at the Canopy when duty permits!

TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_KURENAI_000_040<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! You are also taking part in this curious festival? I confess I find it passing strange to be speaking with you thus beyond the boundaries of the Ruby Sea.

TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_SANANA_000_041<tab>When I said I was headed this way to scout market prices, I was informed─not asked, mind you─that Her Highness here would accompany me in “an effort to better understand the outside world.” Do me a favor and keep this from Shiosai, would you?

TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_KURENAI_000_042<tab>You say we are to be rewarded? I had thought our inclusion in the ritual painting of the chicken eggs was reward enough, and now you offer me gifts. I am overwhelmed by your generosity!
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_Q6_000_000<tab>Which gift set will you choose from?
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_A6_000_001<tab>The rabbit and chicken stuffed toys.
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_A6_000_002<tab>The painted eggs filled with treats.
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_A6_000_003<tab>The opulent Archon eggs.
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_KURENAI_000_043<tab>Oh, are these...little animal dolls? And so wonderfully soft to the touch!

TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_SANANA_000_044<tab>Oho, I know a treat-filled egg when I see one. It's interesting how the presentation makes the contents feel that much more special... In fact, I reckon I could sell these for a profit if you weren't just giving them away.
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_KURENAI_000_045<tab>Such delicate and splendid artifice. And you call this an “Ar-kon” egg? Nay, 'tis far too precious a treasure for me to accept.

TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_SANANA_000_046<tab>I thought you came with me to experience the “outside”? It's customary to receive eggs on Hatching<var 1F /var>tide, so please, just take the gift.
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_KURENAI_000_047<tab>Yes, I suppose you are right. After all, this would be the perfect souvenir for Hisui!
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_KURENAI_000_048<tab><sigh> I shall make one last turn around town, then I suppose I should return home. I pray we meet again soon in Tamamizu!

TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_FUFUCHA_000_050<tab>I don't know if my sense for decoration is all that appealing, but I seem to have made a feathered friend. She must be from the flock belonging to Master Pawlin.

TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_FUFUCHA_000_051<tab>Watching the struggles from afar, I had come to the conclusion that chickens are troublesome creatures, yet this one seems docile enough. So far, she's been content to follow me around as I put the finishing touches on my adornments. Is it my costume, I wonder...?
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_FUFUCHA_000_052<tab>A gift? For me? I feel somewhat guilty accepting a reward for an activity I so thoroughly enjoyed...but if you insist!
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_Q7_000_000<tab>Which gift set will you choose from?
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_A7_000_001<tab>The rabbit and chicken stuffed toys.
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_A7_000_002<tab>The painted eggs filled with treats.
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_A7_000_003<tab>The opulent Archon eggs.

TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_FUFUCHA_000_053<tab>These toys are certainly soft and pleasant to hold, yet I cannot help but wonder what kind of plant fiber was used in their construction. Curse of the professional botanist, I'm afraid.

TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_FUFUCHA_000_054<tab>Are these the eggs they fill with treats? That would explain the delicious aroma. Just what I need after a hard day's work in the planting fields.

TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_FUFUCHA_000_055<tab>These Archon eggs are exquisite, aren't they? Speaking from the viewpoint of one who provides raw materials to artisans, I am thrilled to see my humble contributions transformed into such works of art.
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_2021ESTCHICKEN_000_056<tab>Bok-bok BAKAWK!
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_FUFUCHA_000_057<tab>You like it too, do you? Then I shall display it in a place of pride, where it shall serve as a memento of our brief and unusual companionship.
TEXT_FESEST2021RECOLLECTION_00714_FUFUCHA_000_058<tab>Now, I think it's time I returned this wayward hen to her owner. Fare you well!
